mapper.select: select count(*) as total, COALESCE(SUM(challenger_status = 'in_progress'), 0) as inProgress, COALESCE(SUM(challenger_status IN ('step_failed', 'out_of_process')), 0) as failed, COALESCE(SUM(challenger_status = 'completed'), 0) as completed from view_participant where experience_program_id = #{programId}
mapper.update: update tbl_challenger set challenger_status = #{challengerStatus}, updated_datetime = now() where id = #{id}
